name: Risky Hovercraft Takedown - Free Game
description:
Risky Hovercraft Takedown free game 2016, very addictive, colorful and blocky 3D game

Dangerous Flying that test your reflexes on planet Smashy!
Tilt your phone to change direction & speed but Don't crash.
Out-run your friends on leaderboard and Unlock new hovercraft

Enjoy
• ENDLESS adventure
• UNLOCK cool Hovercrafts
• Easy controls
• Crazy CRASHES

Product of Gamebread "live to play"
